member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_DEFUSAGE
member.summary: The CRYPT_PROVIDER_DEFUSAGE structure is used by the function to retrieve callback information for a provider's default usage.

member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_DEFUSAGE.cbStruct
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of the structure.

member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_DEFUSAGE.gActionID
member.summary: GUID that specifies the provider's default action.

member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_DEFUSAGE.pDefPolicyCallbackData
member.summary: Pointer to a data buffer used to pass policy-specific data to a policy provider.

member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_DEFUSAGE.pDefSIPClientData
member.summary: Pointer to a data buffer used to pass subject interface package (SIP) specific data to an SIP provider.
